Fireball.description: Launch a fiery projectile at your target, causing an explosion on impact.

Magmaball.description: Launch a fiery projectile at your target, causing an explosion on impact.

Healing Touch.description: Channel healing energy to restore health and vitality to a target.

Frost Nova.description: Freeze all nearby enemies in a chilling blast, immobilizing them temporarily.

Teleportation.description: Instantly transport yourself to a different location within your line of sight.

Lightning Strike.description: Call down a bolt of lightning to smite your enemies with electrifying power.

Invisibility.description: Render yourself invisible to escape enemies or perform stealthy actions.

Earthquake.description: Cause the ground to tremble and create shockwaves, damaging all nearby foes.

Mind Control.description: Take control of the thoughts and actions of a target for a limited time.

Ice Lance.description: Summon a sharp ice lance and hurl it at your enemy, piercing through defenses.

Wind Gust.description: Unleash a powerful gust of wind to push back enemies and disrupt their actions.

Shadow Step.description: Instantly teleport between shadows to maneuver stealthily or evade danger. deal 4x damage next attack
